snippet.title: Mars Horizon - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
A first look at Mars Horizon, the latest project from Auroch Digital. All footage is from pre-alpha, in-engine builds.

Visit the Mars Horizon game page over at aurochdigital.com/marshorizonvideogame

In Mars Horizon the player is tasked with leading a major space agency from the dawn of the space age though to humanity's journey to Mars. Players run a government space agency from when the first rockets launched into the atmosphere, right through to the first crewed mission to Mars. Research new tech, expand your agency base, build rockets, send satellites into orbit, and launch a variety of missions. As the player, you’re in charge of every element of the journey into space.

Coming to all major platforms in late 2018.
